name: frgpgrp
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: simpld(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cgrp), wceq(cec(emptycls, cfv(cefg, c0)), cfv(c0g, c2)))
stmt.pretty: simpld(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ Grp, [∅](~FG ` c0)=(0 ` c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, cgrp), wceq(cec(emptycls, cfv(cefg, c0)), cfv(c0g, c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, cgrp), wceq(cec(emptycls, cfv(cefg, c0)), cfv(c0g, c2))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, cgrp), wceq(cec(emptycls, cfv(cefg, c0)), cfv(c0g, c2))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cfrgp, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cefg, c0), cfv(cefg, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cgrp))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cfrgp, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cefg, c0), cfv(cefg, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ Grp)
⊣ c2 =(freeGrp ` c0)
⊣ (~FG ` c0)=(~FG ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cgrp))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cfrgp, c0))

comment: The free group is a group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Oct-2015.)
